title: OPEN HOUSE THIS SATURDAY 8/6 10AM-1PM
posting_body: OPEN HOUSE THIS SATURDAY, AUGUST 6TH 10AM-1PM -  SAME DAY APPLICATIONS AVAILIBLE UNIT #11
2120 Valerga Apartments is a beautiful apartment community located in the hills of Belmont.
The apartment community is minutes to Carlmont Shopping Village which has boutiques, coffee shops, Lunardi's grocery store and a wide variety of restaurants, including Waterdog Tavern.
Belmont Caltrain station is also just a 5-minute drive away.
Living at 2120 Valerga, you will enjoy your surrounding of lush landscape including Redwood trees, Japanese maples, and enjoy our lovely outdoor deck shaded by a mature Oak tree.
2120 Valerga is also a pet friendly community that we are sure your furry family member will love.
Unit Type: 1 Bedroom 1 Bathroom Sq Ft: 600 Available:

Unit Features: Renovated kitchen and bathroom Beautiful hand-picked contemporary hardware and fixtures Newly painted throughout All appliances included plus and large pantry in the kitchen Plenty of storage space throughout the unit with a large linen closet Eat in kitchen area for your dining table Spacious closet in the bedroom Natural light throughout Unit with character and charm
$30 pet rent (per cat) or $50 pet rent (dog)
Maximum 2 pets allowed (2 indoor cats, 1dog or 1 dog and 1 indoor cat)
